               Alive setParent,
               double passX,
               double passY)
        The Constructor that is to be used if specification of a custom target location is needed
        Parameters:
        setSpellName - - Represents the generic stats of the missile that is being created
        setParent - - The Alive that created this missile
        passX - - The x coordinate of this missile's target location
        passY - - The y coordinate of this missile's target location
